channel.title: [PI] Need coder - READ PLEASE
channel.description:
I need coders for the following server:
NOTE: It's just some easy things, i'm pretty new to coding so yeah. Please answer ASAP
Add me on MSN: [b]taurushelp@live.be[/b] OR add me on Skype: [b]zentior.parox[/b]
[quote="marcbob, post:1, topic:361687"]5k Downloads
[size=18pt]if your reading this please comment, i hosted this and once had 150+ players on and it was amazingly fun but im unable to get alot of players now a days so hopefully you can do better getting players than I did. Credits to Me and Underoath for this. Me and him both developed the source and when he quit I kept it going.[/size]
Foreverpkers is probably the most successful using my base :) Gratz to them with 100+ always on! Thats insane!
Server is Project Insanity Based
Features:
Fight Pits: ::pits Barrows: ::barrows Home is edge and dark mage can tele you to pking spots Great shops around edge Ranks: Normal Player, Donator, Super Donator, Mod, Admin ::yell for Donator+ ::yelltag (then tag) for super donators Super donators can spawn by doing ::claws, ::chaoticrapier, ::chaoticmaul, ::chaoticlongsword, ::chaoticstaff ^^ Economy doesnt get ruined by this because those items dissapear when you die pking Specs for Claws, vesta longsword, statius warhammer, and all godswords work Many Non-cb skills added ::master and ::setlevel (lvl id) lvl for all players So much more I cant even remember!
Pictures for people too lazy to read lol:
[URL=http://img801.imageshack.us/i/mtp1.png/][IMG]http://img801.imageshack.us/img801/3421/mtp1.png[/img][/URL]

[URL=http://img210.imageshack.us/i/mtp7.png/][IMG]http://img210.imageshack.us/img210/803/mtp7.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img695.imageshack.us/i/mtp8.png/][IMG]http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/2628/mtp8.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img178.imageshack.us/i/mtp9.png/][IMG]http://img178.imageshack.us/img178/6758/mtp9.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img834.imageshack.us/i/mtp10.png/][IMG]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/2461/mtp10.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img545.imageshack.us/i/mtp11.png/][IMG]http://img545.imageshack.us/img545/8178/mtp11.png[/img][/URL]

DOWNLOADS: Sorry that I just found out they werent working so I just made new ones
SERVER:
CLIENT:
I had to find a version of MTP I still had and that is Fallen Pkers, its the same thing as MTP but i renamed it for one of my friends.[/quote]
Add me on MSN: [b]taurushelp@live.be[/b] OR add me on Skype: [b]zentior.parox[/b]
I'm gonna need about 1, 2 or max. 3 coders. Reply!

item.description:
@Zentior wrote:

I need coders for the following server:

NOTE: It’s just some easy things, i’m pretty new to coding so yeah. Please answer ASAP

Add me on MSN: taurushelp@live.be
OR add me on Skype: zentior.parox

[quote=“marcbob, post:1, topic:361687”]5k Downloads

[size=18pt]if your reading this please comment, i hosted this and once had 150+ players on and it was amazingly fun but im unable to get alot of players now a days so hopefully you can do better getting players than I did. Credits to Me and Underoath for this. Me and him both developed the source and when he quit I kept it going.[/size]

Foreverpkers is probably the most successful using my base Gratz to them with 100+ always on! Thats insane!

Server is Project Insanity Based

Features:

Fight Pits: ::pits
Barrows: ::barrows
Home is edge and dark mage can tele you to pking spots
Great shops around edge
Ranks: Normal Player, Donator, Super Donator, Mod, Admin
::yell for Donator+
::yelltag (then tag) for super donators
Super donators can spawn by doing ::claws, ::chaoticrapier, ::chaoticmaul, ::chaoticlongsword, ::chaoticstaff
^^ Economy doesnt get ruined by this because those items dissapear when you die pking
Specs for Claws, vesta longsword, statius warhammer, and all godswords work
Many Non-cb skills added
::master and ::setlevel (lvl id) lvl for all players
So much more I cant even remember!

Pictures for people too lazy to read lol:

I had to find a version of MTP I still had and that is Fallen Pkers, its the same thing as MTP but i renamed it for one of my friends.[/quote]
